post:
Hi,

I have one of these Kidechires with evoBurst and i dont need it anymore, i have done my tests with it. It cost €8.82 EUR Quarterly, The next due date is 02/02/2015 so its possible to transfer it for free.

If you are interested drop me a PM and please provide a **reason **why you need it, some people buy 50 of them and just let them idle. Otherwise it will not transfered to you.
